subject: Attention:
body:
Attention:
We wish to inform you that your payment of USD$10.5 Million from the
Federal Republic of USA has been released and ready to be paid to your
via ATM VISA CARD which you will use to withdraw the US$10.5 Million
from any ATM Machine in any part of the world.
We have mandated the First MidWest Bank to issue an ATM VISA CARD and
PIN which you will use to withdraw the fund from any ATM machine in
any part of the world but the maximum amount you can withdraw per day
is US$20,000.00. You are strongly advice immediately to contact Mr
Michael Scudder the Manager of First MidWest Bank via his email
address:( 
firstmidwestbankus@gmx.us
) and 
send him your information
such as;
>
1) Your Full Name.
2) Your Contact Address
3) Your Occupation:
4) Your Age
5) Your Sex
6) Your Home Phone, Mobile/Cell Phone and fax Number.
The ATM VISA CARD approval in your name has been sent Mr Michael
Scudder and he is waiting for your above information to enable him
process and send you the CARD and PIN number without any delay. So
make sure you contact him right now with your information and tell him
that you received a message from the UNITED NATION, Instructing you to
contact him for immediate release of your fund via ATM VISA CARD.
Contact FBI via this email:( 
fbidirector.us@gmx.sg
 ) if you did not
receive this ATM VISA CARD after 72hours you contacted him. You are
warned to disregard other contact or any communication you have with
other offices.
Please we are very sorry for the plight you have gone through in the
past. Thanks for adhering to this instruction and once again accept
out congratulations!
Yours Sincerely,
Dr Andrew Goodman
Public Information Officer.
Website: www. un.org/en/index.shtml

subject: Re: Attention:
body:
Hello Dr. Andrew Goodman,

Thank you for your message. It's quite exciting to hear about this opportunity! I'm a bit confused though, could you please explain more about how this ATM VISA CARD works? And why is the maximum withdrawal amount per day set at US$?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Lela

subject: Re: Attention: Dear: Lela
body:
Dear : Lela Regarding the process to issue you an ATM CARD which you will use to withdraw your fund First MidWest Bank USA US$10.5 Million from any ATM machine, It is our pleasure to inform you that International Visa ATM CARD number. 4083052100276719 has been approved in your favor. Your secret pin is 4083 and the amount upgraded in the Visa ATM CARD is US$10.5 Million which has been verified by VISA. Find attached the copy of my staff id card to be sure. 
 
 First MidWest Bank 
So, invitation has been extended to you to visit the here in USA and pay the ATM CARD processing fee of First MidWest Bank US$100.00 and collect your ATM CARD and activate it by changing the Pin to your own private pin before you can start withdrawing your US$10.5 Million from any ATM Machine in any part of the world but the maximum amount you can withdraw in a day is US$20,000.00. 
 
Alternatively, if you are unable to visit here in USA for collection of your ATM CARD as at when due, you must therefore apply for the ATM CARD to be sent to you via courier service at your own expenses by effecting the payments of the following; 
 
1) ATM CARD processing fee amounting to US$ 100.00. 
2) Shipment and Insurance fee amounting to US$1 00.00. 
 
Both payments totaling the sum of US$must be effected paid before we can send the ATM CARD to you via DHL or any courier service you have an account. 200.00 
 
So, should you decide for us to send this your Visa ATM CARD to your address, kindly go now and send APPLE GIFT CARD immediately you confirm this message. Once the fee is received, we shall immediately send the VISA ATM CARD to your address via courier service and issue you the tracking number and it will take only 1-3 days to arrive in your address so that you can withdraw the first US$20,000.00 that same moment. This VISA ATM CARD is a global ATM CARD that dispenses cash from any ATM machine in any part of the world. 
 
Kindly let us know if you wish to come to USA for collection of the ATM CARD or you want us to send it to you. 
 
If you need more information, assistance, kindly call or write back to me as soon as possible. 
 
Yours truly, Mr.Michael ScudderManager,First MidWest Bank usa 96/102, Broad Street, 
PMB 12807, USA 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Envoyé: jeudi 8 février 2024 à 22:39 De: "Lela" <ze37502@***.com> À: firstmidwestbankus@gmx.us Objet: Re: Attention: 
 
Hello Dr. Andrew Goodman, 
Thank you for your message. It's quite exciting to hear about this opportunity! I'm a bit confused though, could you please explain more about how this ATM VISA CARD works? And why is the maximum withdrawal amount per day set at US$? 
I look forward to hearing from you soon. 
Best regards.
Best wishes, 
Lela

subject: Re: Attention: Dear: Lela
body:
Hello Dr. Andrew Goodman,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. I must say, this is quite an interesting opportunity! However, I'm still a bit unclear about a few things. Could you please elaborate on how the ATM VISA CARD functions? Also, why is there a daily withdrawal limit of US$10,000? 

I'm eager to understand more about this process and look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Lela

subject: Re: Attention: Dear: Lela
body:
Hello Lela,

Thank you for your prompt response and interest in our ATM VISA CARD. The card functions just like any other ATM card. You can use it to withdraw money from any ATM machine worldwide. The reason there is a daily withdrawal limit of US$10,000 is to ensure the security of your funds and prevent fraudulent activities.

The process is quite simple. Once you pay the processing fee and shipment insurance fee, we will send the card to your address via courier service. Upon receiving the card, you will need to activate it by changing the PIN to a number of your choice.

I hope this clarifies things for you. If you have any more questions, feel free to ask.

Best regards,
Dr.

Best wishes,
Lela
